title: ni chEyu
sahitya:
nI cEyu vicitramulu evaru cEyuduru O praNatArthihara harA



anupallavi



 rAja rAjEshvaraA nI rAjyamulalO nE jEyu pani lEdA O dEva dEvA



caraNam



 aSTAkaSaramulalO antargatamuga viSNu cittamuna vihArincina shrI 

aSTa lakSmiki anugrahamu jEyalEdA shiSTa tyAgarAju kaSTamu ghanamA
